name: Colours Of Fall
description:
STORY

After losing your job and going through a break up, you want to escape and begin a new life. Your return to a childhood camping spot that has been left behind in your memories after your brothers tragic death during the final camping trip. 

As you explore the beautiful autumn wilderness searching for a new spot to call home, you will find fallen trees and other materials you will need to build your house. After finding the perfect spot to build you must collect the materials needed. You must hunt deer and outsmart a deadly bear to finish building. Once all the materials have been collected you need to return to the spot and begin building.

CONTROLS

Move - WASD keys

Look - Move Mouse 

Jump - Space

Sprint - Shift

Interact - E

Checklist - Tab

Attack - Left Click
